name: MovieMan
0:
”Alexa start movie man”
”Alexa open movie man”
”Alexa launch movie man”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie man
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Movie Man Game!

Are you ready to play this fun and exciting game? Get ready to find out your favorite movie stars from their movie dialogues! Your amazon device will play these dialogues for you. All you need to do is, listen carefully and identify these film star from their voice. Isn’t that interesting? 

Let it be any film stars, you can win with 100 points! If you are not familiar with the voice, just tell any actor name that you know already and get the right answer from Alexa. So that in next chance when you get the same question, you can answer it correctly.

Currently “Movie Man” game supports Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, English and Malayalam movie dialogues. We will be updating the dialogues every month, so that you can play with new dialogues.

Note:
--------------------------
# You can enable the this skill by saying “Alexa enable Movie Man” in your device.
# You can say “Alexa open movie man” to start playing the game.
---------------------------

Suggestions and feedback appreciated. 

If you are facing any issues with the skill, send me an email to assist you better.
Contact - jacksonlives@gmail.com

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Disclaimer
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This “Movie Man” game for amazon devices is intended for fun and entertainment purpose only. It contains audios in Indian local language ‘Hindi’, ’Tamil’, ‘Telugu’, 'Kannada', 'English' and ‘Malayalam’. Users of this skill are fully aware about the local language and accepted to play this game with their own knowledge and experience. We have also taken consent from user to save the game session scores, preferred language for improving the game experience.
